00028 
00042 
00043 GeodesicProblem::GeodesicProblem(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron)       
00044 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00045 {
00046    // Control sentence
00047 
00048    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00049    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00050 
00051    if(numberOfInputs != 1 || numberOfOutputs != 1)
00052    {
00053       std::cerr << std::endl
00054                 << "Flood Error: GeodesicProblem class." << std::endl
00055                 << "GeodesicProblem(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00056                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be 1." << std::endl
00057                 << std::endl;
00058 
00059       exit(1);
00060    }
00061 
00062    xA = 0.0;
00063    yA = 1.0;
00064    xB = 1.0;
00065    yB = 0.0;
00066 
00067    tolerance = 1.0e-12;
00068    initialSize = 1000;
00069 
00070    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00071    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setInitialSize(initialSize);
00072 }
00073

00090 {
00091    xA = 0.0;
00092    yA = 0.1;
00093    xB = 1.0;
00094    yB = 0.0;
00095 
00096    tolerance = 1.0e-12;
00097    initialSize = 1000;
00098 }

00223 // void setTolerance(double) method

00229 
00230 void GeodesicProblem::setTolerance(double newTolerance)
00231 {
00232    // Control sentence
00233 
00234    if(newTolerance <= 0.0)
00235    {
00236       std::cerr << std::endl
00237                 << "Flood Error: GeodesicProblem class." << std::endl
00238                 << "void setTolerance(double) method." << std::endl
00239                 << "Tolerance must be greater than 0." << std::endl
00240                 << std::endl;
00241 
00242       exit(1);
00243    }
00244 
00245    // Set tolerance
00246 
00247    tolerance = newTolerance;
00248 
00249    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00250 }

00268 // Vector<double> calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double>)
00269 
00279 
00280 Vector<double> GeodesicProblem::calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double> input)
00281 {
00282    // Control sentence
00283 
00284    int size = input.getSize();
00285 
00286    if(size != 1)
00287    {
00288       std::cerr << std::endl
00289                 << "Flood Error: GeodesicProblem class." << std::endl
00290                 << "Vector<double> calculateParticularSolution(Vector<double>)." << std::endl
00291                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00292                 << std::endl;
00293 
00294       exit(1);
00295    }
00296 
00297    // Calculate particular solution
00298 
00299    Vector<double> particularSolution(1);
00300 
00301    double x = input[0];
00302 
00303    particularSolution[0] = yA + (yB-yA)*(x-xA)/(xB-xA);
00304 
00305    return(particularSolution);
00306 }
00307 
00308 
00309 // Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double>)
00310 
00320 
00321 Vector<double> GeodesicProblem::calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double> input)
00322 {
00323    // Control sentence
00324 
00325    int size = input.getSize();
00326 
00327    if(size != 1)
00328    {
00329       std::cerr << std::endl
00330                 << "Flood Error: GeodesicProblem class." << std::endl
00331                 << "Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolution(Vector<double>)." << std::endl
00332                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00333                 << std::endl;
00334 
00335       exit(1);
00336    }
00337 
00338    // Calculate homogeneous solution
00339 
00340    Vector<double> homogeneousSolution(1);
00341 
00342    double x = input[0];
00343 
00344    homogeneousSolution[0] = (x-xA)*(x-xB);
00345 
00346    return(homogeneousSolution);
00347 }

00350 // Vector<double> calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>)
00351 
00360 
00361 Vector<double> GeodesicProblem::calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(Vector<double> input)
00362 {
00363    // Control sentence
00364 
00365    int size = input.getSize();
00366 
00367    if(size != 1)
00368    {
00369       std::cerr << std::endl
00370                 << "Flood Error: GeodesicProblem class." << std::endl
00371                 << "Vector<double> calculateParticularSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>)." << std::endl
00372                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00373                 << std::endl;
00374 
00375       exit(1);
00376    }
00377 
00378    // Calculate particular solution derivative
00379 
00380    Vector<double> particularSolutionDerivative(1);
00381 
00382    particularSolutionDerivative[0] = (yB-yA)/(xB-xA);
00383 
00384    return(particularSolutionDerivative);
00385 }

00388 // Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>)
00389 
00398 
00399 Vector<double> GeodesicProblem::calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double> input)
00400 {
00401    // Control sentence
00402 
00403    int size = input.getSize();
00404 
00405    if(size != 1)
00406    {
00407       std::cerr << std::endl
00408                 << "Flood Error: GeodesicProblem class." << std::endl
00409                 << "Vector<double> calculateHomogeneousSolutionDerivative(Vector<double>)." << std::endl
00410                 << "Size of input vector must be 1." << std::endl
00411                 << std::endl;
00412 
00413       exit(1);
00414    }
00415 
00416    // Calculate homogeneous solution derivative
00417 
00418    Vector<double> homogeneousSolutionDerivative(1);
00419 
00420    double x = input[0];
00421 
00422    homogeneousSolutionDerivative[0] = (x-xA) + (x-xB);
00423 
00424    return(homogeneousSolutionDerivative);
00425 }

00428 // double calculateArcLengthIntegrand(double, double) method
00429 
00436 
00437 double GeodesicProblem::calculateArcLengthIntegrand(double x, double dummy)
00438 {
00439    double arcLengthIntegrand = 0.0;
00440 
00441    Vector<double> input(1, x);
00442 
00443    Matrix<double> jacobian = multilayerPerceptron->calculateJacobian(input, *this);
00444 
00445    double dydx = jacobian[0][0];
00446 
00447    arcLengthIntegrand = sqrt(1.0 + pow(dydx,2));
00448 
00449    return(arcLengthIntegrand);   
00450 }
00451 
00452 
00453 // double calculateArcLength(void) method       
00454 
00460 
00461 double GeodesicProblem::calculateArcLength(void)      
00462 {
00463    double arcLength = 0.0;
00464 
00465    Vector<double> x;
00466    Vector<double> y;
00467 
00468    int numberOfPoints 
00469    = ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this,
00470    x, y, 
00471    &GeodesicProblem::calculateArcLengthIntegrand,
00472    xA, xB, 0.0);
00473 
00474    arcLength = y[numberOfPoints-1];
00475 
00476    return(arcLength);   
00477 }

00480 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00481 
00485 
00486 double GeodesicProblem::calculateEvaluation()
00487 {
00488     // Control sentence 
00489 
00490    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00491    {
00492       std::cerr << std::endl
00493                 << "Flood Error: GeodesicProblem class." << std::endl
00494                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00495                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00496                 << std::endl;
00497 
00498         exit(1);
00499    }
00500 
00501    double evaluation = 0.0;
00502 
00503    // Increment number of evaluations
00504 
00505    numberOfEvaluations++;
00506 
00507    evaluation = calculateArcLength();
00508 
00509    return(evaluation);
00510 }

00513 // void saveResults(char*) method
00514 
00524 
00525 void GeodesicProblem::saveResults(char* filename)
00526 {
00527    std::fstream file; 
00528 
00529    // Control sentence
00530 
00531    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
00532 
00533    if(!file.is_open())
00534    {
00535       std::cout << "Cannot open geodesic problem results data file."  << std::endl;
00536       
00537       exit(1);
00538    }
00539    else
00540    {
00541       if(display)
00542       {
00543          std::cout << std::endl
00544                    << "Saving geodesic problem results to data file..." << std::endl;
00545       }
00546    }
00547 
00548    Vector<double> input(1);
00549    Vector<double> output(1);
00550 
00551    double x = 0.0;
00552    double y = 0.0;
00553     
00554    // File header
00555 
00556     file << "% Flood Neural Network. Geodesic problem results data file." << std::endl
00557          << "% Column data:" << std::endl
00558          << "%  1 - Independent variable (x)" << std::endl
00559          << "%  2 - Dependent variable (y)" << std::endl
00560          << std::endl;
00561 
00562    // File data
00563 
00564    int numberOfPoints = 1001;
00565 
00566    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00567    {
00568       // Obtain x
00569 
00570       x = i/(numberOfPoints-1.0);
00571 
00572       // Obtain input
00573 
00574       input[0] = x;
00575 
00576       // Obtain output
00577 
00578       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input, *this);
00579 
00580       // Obtain y
00581 
00582       y = output[0];
00583 
00584       // Write x and y to file
00585 
00586       file << x << " " << y << std::endl;   
00587    }   
00588 
00589    file.close();
00590 }
